A Simple Trading Strategy

Setting the scene for Machine Learning in Quantitative Finance

Posted on 09 July, 2020

We have all heard of Warren Buffet. The Oracle of Omaha, as of 2019, has achieved an average annual return of 20.5%. This far beats the average inflation rate of 9.95% per year since 1965. Compound interest means that $1 invested in 1965 is now worth over $23,000! [Read More]
